t: Amazon Launches New Size Chart Self-Serve Tool for Brand Registry Members | Swipe Insight
s: May 23, 2024 - New Amazon Size Chart Self-Serve Tool allows Brand Registry members to add or modify size charts effortlessly. Eligible brands get automatic access. The tool lets you upload or edit size charts independently, download templates, and preview before publishing.

List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 7 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
